description: Search for files and directories - learn file system navigation

tasks.title: Find by Name
tasks.description: Find all files named 'config.txt' starting from the current directory. What command would you use?
hints: Use '.' for current directory and '-name' for filename
tasks.explanation: The find command searches for files. '.' means current directory, '-name' searches by filename.

tasks.title: Case Insensitive Name Search
tasks.description: Find files named 'README' (ignoring case) in the current directory. What option makes name matching case-insensitive?
hints: Use '-iname' instead of '-name' for case-insensitive search
tasks.explanation: The '-iname' option performs case-insensitive filename matching.

tasks.title: Find by File Type
tasks.description: Find all regular files (not directories) in the current directory. What option filters by file type?
hints: 'f' stands for regular files, 'd' for directories
tasks.explanation: The '-type f' option finds only regular files, excluding directories and special files.

tasks.title: Find Directories Only
tasks.description: Find all directories in the current directory tree. How do you search for directories only?
tasks.explanation: The '-type d' option finds only directories.

tasks.title: Find by File Extension
tasks.description: Find all Python files (.py) in the current directory tree. How do you search by file extension?
hints: Put the pattern in quotes to prevent shell expansion
tasks.explanation: Use wildcards with -name to find files by extension. Quotes prevent the shell from expanding the wildcard.

tasks.title: Find by Size
tasks.description: Find files larger than 1MB in the current directory. What option searches by file size?
hints: Use '-size' with +1M for files larger than 1 megabyte
M = megabytes, K = kilobytes, G = gigabytes
tasks.explanation: The '-size +1M' option finds files larger than 1 megabyte. Use + for 'greater than', - for 'less than'.

tasks.title: Find Recently Modified Files
tasks.description: Find files modified in the last 7 days. What option searches by modification time?
tasks.explanation: The '-mtime -7' option finds files modified within the last 7 days.

tasks.title: Execute Command on Found Files
tasks.description: Find all .tmp files and delete them. How do you execute a command on found files?
tasks.explanation: The '-delete' option removes found files. You can also use '-exec command {} \;' to run any command on found files.
